select c.com_id,c.goods_id,c.u_id,c.parent_cid,c.by_cid,c.com_content,c.com_time, c.com_state,c.com_grade,u.u_name,uf.face_id, (SELECT COUNT(1) from praise p where p.com_id=c.com_id) as praise_num
,(SELECT 1 from praise p where p.com_id=c.com_id and p.u_id=#{param4}) as the_user
from comments c INNER JOIN user_info u inner JOIN user_face uf on c.u_id=u.u_id and u.u_id=uf.u_id where c.goods_id=#{param3} and c.com_grade='1' and c.com_state='1'

ORDER BY com_time > #{param6}, IF(com_time < #{param6}, 0, com_time), com_time DESC

select c.com_id,c.goods_id,c.u_id,c.parent_cid,c.by_cid,c.com_content, c.com_time,c.com_state,c.com_grade,u.u_name,uf.face_id, (SELECT COUNT(1) from praise p where p.com_id=c.com_id) as praise_num, (select bu.u_name from user_info bu INNER JOIN comments bc on bu.u_id=bc.u_id where bc.com_id=c.by_cid) as by_uName, (select COUNT(1) from comments where parent_cid =#{param3} and com_state='1') as total

order by (SELECT COUNT(1) from praise p where p.com_id=c.com_id) desc
